scripts.say: We welcome you to the Diadem of Light. I am Ryuuhou, and I will serve as your guide.
Ah, how nice it is to see you after so long, Ryuuhou.
Likewise. It is good to see you and Kaga are in good health.
Yeah, yeah. We already know the rule. "Participants in the ritual must demonstrate their might as a show of respect."
...Kaga, do not underestimate her. Even if she's a light carrier, she must be powerful if she is in charge of organizing the ritual.
Indeed. All I do is for the Sakura Empire's future!
